name: SML: Size Matters
description:
Size matters when you buy new clothes!

We created this game for MashUp Game Jam.
The theme was "Size Matters", that's why we created a game about selling clothes in a correct size.

Controls:
• Use Arrows to move.
• Use Z, X, or C to pick up clothes and sell them.
• Use SpaceBar to buy a Power-Up in a machine.

Used Software:
• Unity
• Aseprite
• Audacity
• Chrome Music Lab
• Bfxr
